findings.title: Owner Can Restrict User's Token Transfer
findings.description: The Contract Owner can restrict user's token transfer by inputting a specific address and 0 as parameters to the _ARMYDOLLAR#transferWithLocking() function, without actually sending tokens.

findings.title: 조레어 Event 가 입의승
findings.description: The functions listed do not emit events, making it difficult to track changes and function calls in real-time. It is recommended to add events corresponding to the changes occurring in these functions.
